https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UC6lIo60NLs UP主亲自翻译QWQ 喜欢本视频的可以扔硬币&充电给机芯哦~原视频介绍：Imagine playing Minecraft in a world that didn\'t allow you to break wood with your hand. Wood is essential to getting started in Minecraft... so what could you do?
